briefTitle: Southern Bone & Joint Study - Brimless Sockets

armGroups.label: Active Comparator: Prosthetic socket standard of care

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Unilateral transfemoral or knee-disarticulation amputee
* 18 to 85 years of age
* K3 (variable cadence and community) ambulators;
* Be able to independently provide informed consent
* Be willing to comply with study procedures.

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of chronic skin breakdown on the residual limb
* Conditions that would prevent participation and pose increased risk (e.g. unstable cardiovascular conditions that preclude physical activity such as walking)
* Use of any assistive devices/walking aids, beyond a prosthesis, to ambulate
* Unwillingness/inability to follow instructions

outcomeMeasures.title: Gait
outcomeMeasures.description: Gait will be assessed in terms of biomechanics and spatiotemporal parameters.

outcomeMeasures.title: Balance and Stability
outcomeMeasures.description: Balance and stability will be assessed for limits of stability and postural stability.

outcomeMeasures.title: Quality of Life
outcomeMeasures.description: Validated surveys will be used to solicit participants' subjective experience and feedback.

outcomeMeasures.title: Socket Pressure
outcomeMeasures.description: Pressure sensors are placed on the skin and measured.
